feature.label: CoProc2
feature.description:
This features provides an Eclipse Run Configuration for the DataPower CoProc2 service. The DataPower CoProc2 service must already be installed on the target DataPower appliance. This export for this service may be downloaded from
http://glezen.org/update/coproc2-2/coproc22.zip
